name: Whirl
description: Fun, anonymous chats with random members of your Slack!

SLACK_CLIENT_BOT_TOKEN.description: Bot user’s OAuth access token. Usually starts with `xoxb-`.

SLACK_CLIENT_SIGNING_SECRET.description: Signing secret from Slack used to confirm source of incoming messages.

DATABASE_URL.description: Your MongoDB database’s URL. Used to store chat metadata.

CHAT_METADATA_THRESHOLD.description: The minimum amount of messages needed for a chat’s metadata to be saved.
